effect.name: TAP TubeWarmth
effect.description:
TAP TubeWarmth (LADSPA 2158)
Adds the character of vacuum tube amplification by emulating the sonically desirable nonlinear characteristics of triodes. It also supports emulating analog tape saturation.
effect.author: http://www.ladspa.org

parameter.name: Drive
parameter.comment: Adjusts the amount of the effect

parameter.name: Tape--Tube Blend
parameter.comment: Controls the color of the TubeWarmth sound
